q1.question: How does the selling process work with Easy Closers?
q1.answer: After an initial call, one of our experts will visit your property to assess its cash value. We‚Äôll give you a clear, fair offer on the spot, no pressure. If you accept, we can close in as little as 7 days or on your timeline.

q2.question: Where do you buy homes?
q2.answer: We currently buy homes in most major metropolitan areas across the U.S. We started in California (Los Angeles, San Diego, San Francisco) and have expanded to Texas, Florida, Arizona, and Nevada. Contact us even if you're outside these areas‚Äîwe may still be able to help.

q3.question: Do you really buy houses in any condition?
q3.answer: Yes, we buy homes in any condition‚Äîdamaged, vacant, outdated, or in need of repairs. No cleaning, repairs, or showings required. We buy the house as-is.

q4.question: How long does the closing take?
q4.answer: We can close in as little as 7 days if needed, or up to 60 days if you need more time. The choice is yours. Our goal is to make your transition as smooth as possible.

q5.question: Can I get money before closing?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer up to $20,000 in cash upfront to help with moving expenses. It's secure, no-interest money to support you during the transition.

q6.question: Why choose Easy Closers over a real estate agent?
q6.answer: With an agent, you pay up to 6% in commissions, need repairs, showings, and risk the deal falling through. With us, there are no commissions, no repairs, no showings, and we close with certainty.

q7.question: Is this way of selling safe?
q7.answer: Yes. We have over 25 years of experience and an A+ rating with the BBB. We‚Äôve helped thousands of homeowners sell fast and stress-free. Check our reviews on Google, Yelp, and BBB.

q8.question: Can I cancel if I change my mind?
q8.answer: Yes, you have time to reconsider. There's no pressure. You can cancel without cost during the review period, which varies by state.

q9.question: What about taxes or property liens?
q9.answer: We handle mortgage payoffs, back taxes, and other liens. You receive the net cash proceeds with no remaining obligations.

q10.question: Can I sell land or commercial properties?
